Description: Fragment of linen containing a demotic plea to Thoth of 10 lines.
Curator's comments: Bibliography Martin, C.J. 2016-2017. The Michaelides Demotic Material, Enchoria 35: 1-8.
Published by G. R. Hughes, 'A Demotic Plea to Thoth in the Library of G. Michaelides', JEA 54 (1968), pp. 176-82.
